signals.Ask: We need an AI solution to automatically read and respond to customer emails.
signals.Evidence: We need something automatized that... we cannot do that now.

signals.Ask: We are open to some human intervention for complex queries.
signals.Evidence: We know that the AI has to learn and understand the messages we receive so that it can answer correctly.

signals.Ask: We want to minimize costs and prefer a plan for two users.
signals.Evidence: Our idea is to spend the less money possible.

signals.Ask: We aim to make a decision by next week after evaluating other options.
signals.Evidence: I think on Wednesday, I can have all that information and take the decision.

signals.Ask: The platform must support responses in Spanish.
signals.Evidence: Does it have the option in Spanish?
